How We're Different

Today’s students need to graduate with the ability to work and live in a project-based world. Students learn the skills they need to succeed in their chosen career and become active community members.

For Prospective Students & families

Interested in enrolling your child at Avalon School? Learn about how our program works and what to expect when you have an Avalon student.

For Current Students

Students and families, this is where you will find current programs, projects and other important and useful information related to everyday life at school.

Avalon School is Dedicated to Lifelong Learning

Come Be Part of the Fun!

Avalon School always needs volunteers to serve as experts, tutor our students, donate to our food shelf and join our Parent Association. We also rely on donations from community members to keep our school running. We appreciate your donation, whether it’s time, funds or both.

Get Involved Donate
